name: Wheel of Balance (GGJ)
description:
My quick submission to the Global Game Jam 2022, made in like 10 hours.

Maintain universal equilibrium otherwise the entire cosmos will implode into a singularity chaos and it will be all your fault. Jerk.

Also, yeah, I know a Yin-Yang-based theme for this year's global game jam is the first idea EVERYONE thought of and is SUPER unoriginal, but in my defence I barely spent any time on this Jam and just shilled something simple out for the sake of being in the GGJ.

(I ran out of time so the How To Play button doesn't work in the game)

Instructions:

Click and drag to rotate the Yin-Yang wheel. Incoming energy spheres will collide with the wheel and change the balance based on which side it hits. Try to main a balance of the two polarities, as the game will end if the Yin and the Yang overlap.
